Title: Premasoothram
Actors: Manju Satheesh, Balu Varghese, Chemban Vinod Jose, Lijo Mol Jose
Plot: A tale of two men falling for the same girl Ammukuty, who is completely oblivious of their love. While Prakashan and Suku fight amongst themselves for her love, a third man vying for it enters her life.
